snippet: The head of judo’s world governing body fired back at international cycling’s chief for suggesting judo could be moved to the Winter Olympics.
lead_paragraph: The head of judo’s world governing body fired back at international cycling’s chief for suggesting judo could be moved to the Winter Olympics.

headline.main: Judo Chief Dislikes Plan to Move Sport to Winter
headline.print_headline: Judo Chief Dislikes Plan to Move Sport to Winter
